item.title: 您会绘制点阵图吗？了解美联储如何预测
item.description: 几乎可以肯定，这是金融市场上最受密切关注的散点图。自 2012 年 1 月以来，美联储每三个月就会更新一次 "点阵图"，这让分析师们趋之若鹜。"点阵图 "已成为美国中央银行事实上的货币政策预测—；无论美联储是否希望如此。它也是美联储决策委员会内部不同意见的重要线索来源，尽管它既隐晦又关键。【原文：It’s almost certainly the most closely scrutinized scatter chart in financial markets. Every three months since January 2012, the Federal Reserve has sent analysts scurrying by updating its “dot plot,” which has become the de facto monetary policy forecast of the US central bank — whether the Fed wants it to be or not. It’s also an important source of clues to dissent within the Fed’s policy making committee, even if it can be as cryptic as it is crucial.】

item.title: 高超音速武器及其重要性
item.description: 高超音速武器速度极快，其速度可以改变周围的空气分子。它们可以携带核弹头，低空飞行，难以探测。它们是美国与俄罗斯和中国之间不断升级的竞争的核心。它们在战斗中的使用引起了人们的警惕。乌克兰声称俄罗斯在2024年初使用高超音速导弹攻击基辅。不仅仅是世界军事强国试图用高超音速武器库来引起人们的敬畏：也门胡塞武装叛乱分子就使用了高超音速导弹。【原文：Hypersonic weapons are so fast, their speed can change the surrounding air molecules. They can carry a nuclear warhead, fly low and be hard to detect. They’re at the center of escalating competition between the US on one side and Russia and China on the other. And their use in combat has raised alarms. Ukraine claimed that Russia used a hypersonic missile to attack Kiev in early 2024. It’s not just the world’s military powers that seek to elicit awe with a hypersonic arsenal: Yemen’s Houthi rebe】
